name: You Have 10 Seconds! (LD51)
description:
Welcome to You Have 10 Seconds!

As the name indicates it, you have 10 seconds to clean the room and get out! If you cannot do it on time, you will get killed.

How to play:

  • Move your player and shoot the enemies to open the exit door!
  • Slide to avoid enemy bullets!
  • There are 6 rooms in this dungeon so you have 1 minute maximum to finish it

Controls:

Move playerArrow keys, ZQSD, WASDShootMouse left click SlideSpace

This game has been made in less than 48 hours for Ludum Dare 51 (theme: every 10 seconds) by Nicolas.

All assets have been made by me during this Jam, except:

Fonts:

  • Karmatic Arcade by Vic Fieger : https://www.1001fonts.com/karmatic-arcade-font.html

Made with Construct-3
